segments.text: Mary , it seems that your family and friends have been calling you recently , am I right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , they have been concerned about me finding a job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They want to recommend some jobs to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My father wants me to work as a trainee in his company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My aunt says her company is in need of an assistant now , and she wants me to give it a try .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One of my friends tells me that his company is hiring in a large scale and he wants me to go for an interview .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can give it a try ! May be you will succeed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . Let me think it over .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you have any good jobs , keep an eye for me !
segments.speaker: S1
